reviewtext: There is no doubt that this is a great switch and with 8 ports you cant go wrong.  Just plug it in and go.  I have been using Linksys for years with no problems, and we use all Cisco equipment at the hospital where I work. I only gave 4 stars because the switch in the picture is not what I received.  This switch is smaller and all black.  Really no big deal, but I like to receive what I am looking at.  Otherwise, I would have said 5 stars.
